attributes.action: Make an appropriate award to the Falkland Islanders.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the wake of the 25th anniversary of the Falklands campaign we would like to propose the Falkland Islanders be given an appropriate award in recognition of their many acts of bravery, and assistance to the troops in retaking the islands thereby preserving British sovereignty. 

During the campaign many islanders gave valuable assistance to the troops in the form of providing accommodation and food, transporting casualties and ammunition re-supply. At times the islanders placed themselves in great danger by moving troops and ammunition to forward areas.
